controller
Class MainController

java.lang.Object
  controller.MainController

public class MainController
extends Object

Handles all connections involving XMPP protocol.

sendMessage

public void sendMessage(String messageString,
                        String to)
                 throws org.jivesoftware.smack.XMPPException
This method is using to send the message to friend. Explicitly sets a receiver. If the receiver is unknown, then use the overloaded sendMessage() which automatically sends the reply to the open conversation.

Parameters:
messageString -
to -
Throws:
org.jivesoftware.smack.XMPPException
